    • Uses of AbstractTile in com.aaronmreyes.scrabble.core.tiles

      Subclasses of AbstractTile in com.aaronmreyes.scrabble.core.tiles 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbilityTile
      Class that contains the setup for any ability tile.
      class  DoubleLetter
      An AbilityTile that takes a specific tile placed at the same location as this tile and doubles that letters point value for the score.
      class  DoubleWord
      An AbilityTile that takes the total word score and doubles it.
      class  LetterBombTile
      Letter Bomb: The player's word used is not scored.
      class  LoseWordTile
      Lose-a-Word: The player who activates this tile loses her current turn.
      class  NegativePointTile
      Negative-points: The word that activated this tile is scored negatively for the player who activated the tile; i.e., the player loses (rather than gains) the points for the played word.
      class  NormalTile
      A Normal Tile with no special ability.
      class  StealWordTile
      Steal-a-word: The player who activates this tile does not gain any points.
      class  TripleLetter
      An AbilityTile that takes a specific tile placed at the same location as this tile and triples that letters point value for the score.
      class  TripleWord
      An AbilityTile that takes the total word score and triples it.
